WOF intro

Greetings!

Who you are?

Who am I? I don't think I have ever had a harder time answering that. I have
been a lot of things in my life. 

Where are you?

What’s your faith story?

What’s your background? Any cool stories to tell?

Why did you join the Word on Fire Institute?
